nodes.text: Ciphas was a male humanoid commander of the Dread Host during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He, Heirad, and Kel'sara were part of the forces that accompanied Kephess to Asation, and the trio fell in battle while guarding the path to the Grand Hypergate through the Quadrilateral Forum.
Ciphas, along with Heirad and Kel'sara, appear collectively as the second boss in "Terror From Beyond," an Operation in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
